title: Mystery Gift not working?
body:
Im trying to gift a mate the 790 RP mystert gift but its saying he has either received the max amount of gifts of this type, or hes not lvl 5..

He hasnt received any gifts at all in 2 days and hes been lvl 30 for years lol.
He recently changed his name, not sure if riot is recognising his account as a new account and he hasnt been on my list for 2 weeks but idk, its not letting him gift me either.

replies.body:
This is not my field of expertise, but I'll say something.

Could it be related to how Riot are currently sending out mystery gifts to well behaved summoners? I say this because summoners with less than ten skins left to purchase cannot receive this gift, which may be affecting your ability to send/receive gifts.
